name: La Ruota Della Sfortuna: Prima parte
summary:
"You've received a strange message (an MMS... yes, you read that right) from your uncle, and you've just arrived at his house to find out what happened.

Strangely, all the lights are off, and the front door is open.

The situation worries you a bit, but you gather your courage—your uncle might be in danger.

You turn on your phone's flashlight and step inside..."

"La Ruota Della Sfortuna - Prima parte" is the first part of the game. It was created to participate in the ITALOCURSO Game Jam 2024."
